name: Dream Catcher (itch)
description:
A game from the UW-Stout Fall 2016 48 Hour Game Jam.

Play as a cool wizard who steals others' dreams. Keep your patients in bed and make sure they're not having nightmares. (Requires a keyboard)

Created by:

Keenan Barber - Programming

Bronson Bero - Art

Austin Lewer - Art

Shane Yach - Programming / Sound
